entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
